content: next row 2 front needle| k1 ssk k to last 3 stitch on the back needle as if to knit sts k2tog k1 towards the front leaving the stitch on row 2 back needle| k1 ssk k to last 3 the needle pull yarn taut sts k2tog k1 repeat steps 1-4 until 1 st remains on repeat row 1-2 until you are down to each needle half of your original stitches sl sts off needle and thread yarn to inside 24 28 32 36 or 12 14 16 18 on each of sock needle weave in ends and block if desired repeat row 2 until 6 8 8 10 stitches remain on each needle now enjoy your socks and tag me in your pictures on instagram
